sub_topic: Prove that the symmetric difference of two sets is not associative with respect to Cartesian product.
message_1: Let A = {1, 2, 3} and B = {2, 3, 4}. Find (A Δ B) Δ {(1,0), (2,0), (3,0)} and deduce whether the symmetric difference of two sets is associative with respect to Cartesian product or not.
